title: What are the benefits of writing and publishing your own book? - Quora

A self-published book can be used to promote a physical product. A self-published book can start a consulting or coaching company. A self-published book can recruit employees to work for your company. A self-published book can launch small groups, seminars, and workshops. A self-published book can be used to get lucrative speaking engagements. A self-published book can be used as a marketing tool for a video course. Everyone needs ATTENTION. The best way to get attention is to be a self-published author. By getting people's attention, you'll get more SALES. By getting people's attention, you'll have new OPPORTUNITIES come to you. By getting people's attention, you'll attract the BEST TALENT to your company. By getting people's attention, you'll receive MEDIA COVERAGE for your company. By getting people's attention, you'll be able to RAISE MONEY from Venture Capitalists. By getting people's attention, you'll be an authority in the market place and receive PAID SPEAKING ENGAGEMENTS. By writing and self-publishing a book, you'll get ATTENTION. Writing and self-publishing a book gets you attention because it raises your VISIBILITY. I wish you the best of success!

I’d add to the answers already posted and say that publishing a book on your own gives you some much more creative control. You can find the right editors, the right cover designers, and market it the way you want to without having to rely on a publisher to give the okay on anything. You can make a book free, give discounts, give review copies, and choose teh categories you want your book listed under. You can go in and make changes to the ebook, make changes to the sales page, and add content if you need to. A publisher is not going to let you do that.

The benefits and the drawbacks are, actually, the same. One benefit is that you’re guaranteed to get your book out there, without the pain of going through editors and rewrites. One drawback is that you’re guaranteed to get your book out there, without the benefit of going through editors and rewrites, so your book might be misspelled, poorly organized crap and you’ll never know it until it’s too late. One benefit is that self-publishing online means your book exists in e-book format, the most modern way to read a book. One drawback is that self-publishing online means your book exists in e-book format, and not in a nice hardcover, bound-paper kind of book, and so you may miss a large group of potential readers.
